item.title: By: Isaac Yuen
item.dc:creator: Isaac Yuen
item.description: As a visual learner, the burrowing diagram was super useful. I always wondered how razor clams move. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: As a visual learner, the burrowing diagram was super useful. I always wondered how razor clams move. Thanks!
